about_the_game:
Step into the mind of Mike and explore the depths of a twisted reality in this heart-pounding psychological horror first-person platformer. Dodge deadly obstacles at every turn and unravel the truth hidden deep within Mike's psych as you navigate his tormented memories. But beware; she is watching your every move. Can you solve the puzzles and escape this nightmarish world before its too late?


Solve Puzzles

Master the nightmarish world within Mike's mind and, solve puzzles as you work your way back to reality.
.



Dodge deadly obstacles

Plan each move carefully; and avoid deadly obstacles.
.

Key features:

Psychological Puzzle Solving: Delve into the depths of Mike's mind as you solve intricate puzzles and unravel the mysteries of his suppressed memories.

Immersive Atmospheric Experience: Immerse yourself in a hauntingly atmospheric world, where every shadow and sound contribute to the suspenseful and emotional journey.

Precision Dodging: Master the art of precision dodging as you narrowly escape the razor-sharp edges of deadly saws. Each movement counts, making every evasion a pulse-pounding moment of skill and strategy.

Sinister Narration: Experience an unsettling narrative as the tormenting voice narrates Mike's journey, injecting a sinister tone into every revelation and decision, creating an immersive and eerie storytelling experience.

Do you have what it takes to escape the unknown?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3Ghz Quad-core intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3Ghz Quad-core intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices.

short_description: A psychological horror, first-person platformer. Dive into the depths of Mike's tormented mind as you navigate deadly obstacles, solve puzzles, and confront inner demons. Do you have what it takes to escape The Unknown?
